Template.SubjectPart: Welcome! Here Are Your AWS Access Keys.
Template.HtmlPart:
Below are your AWS Access Keys. These keys will allow you to generate access credentials for the production and warehouse databases.

Note: These keys should be kept private as they tie back to your user. All actions performed are logged to AWS Access Logs.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: {{access_key}}
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: {{secret_key}}

Instructions

Setup awscli:
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-chap-getting-started.html#cli-quick-configuration

Generate an auth token:
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/UsingWithRDS.IAMDBAuth.Connecting.AWSCLI.html#UsingWithRDS.IAMDBAuth.Connecting.AWSCLI.AuthToken

Connect to database:
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/UsingWithRDS.IAMDBAuth.Connecting.AWSCLI.html#UsingWithRDS.IAMDBAuth.Connecting.AWSCLI.Connect

How To:

aws rds generate-db-auth-token \
--hostname prod-database.cluster-cxw0vmfouoz6.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com \
--port 3306 \
--region us-west-2 \
--username {{user_name}}
